content: Hey Friends (and probably Lloyd). I believe that I may have greater permissions to edit jiras on the CDS Hooks and FHIRcat specification than on the IPA specification -- which we just added to jira late last year.
• (Specifically, I don't have the ability to "Adjust Fields" on an un-triaged jira so as to add tags to it, which is handy for categorizing jiras into buckets for further action).
Would it be possible to up my permission level for jira's where: specification=International Patient Access (FHIR) ?
yes, send an email to @Lloyd McKenzie

@Isaac Vetter You're already a 'trusted user'. There's no "adjust fields" option available on untriaged issues. Step 1 is always to triage (during which you can adjust pretty much everything). Adjusting fields is something that becomes available post-triage.
thank you, Lloyd! Sorry for the newbie question.
np. It was a reasonable question, and this is the place for them :)
I'm stuck in another meeting and will be late to call in.
@Bas van den Heuvel - wrong thread?
